section.46: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sufyan, from Abu Az-Zubair, that Jabir said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The pilferer is not to be cut off."' (Sahih) Ibn Juraij also did not hear it from Abu Az-Zubair. Ibn Juraij also did not hear it from Abu Az-Zubair
